sense.gloss: it's been a long time, long time no see

sdata.j: ↑大変|↑↓たいへん↓お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|です。
sdata.e: It's been ages since I saw you last.

sdata.j: お↑元気↑↓げんき↓ですか。|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|ですね。
sdata.e: How are you doing? I haven't seen you for an age!
I haven't seen you for a long time.
It's been a while since we last met.
I haven't seen you in a long time.
I haven't seen you for a while.
I haven't seen you for ages.
Wow! It's been a long time.
